meanings.definition: A person who supervises or directs workers.
meanings.sent1: The supervisor made sure everyone was doing their job correctly.
meanings.sent2: The supervisor at the construction site wore a hard hat.
meanings.sent3: The supervisor joked that they needed to hire a robot to do the work.
meanings.sent4: The supervisor's watchful eye was like a hawk, catching any mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor's presence loomed large over the busy factory floor.

meanings.definition: A person who oversees or manages a process or activity.
meanings.sent1: The supervisor of the project ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The supervisor of the event coordinated all the logistics.
meanings.sent3: The supervisor pretended to be a detective solving the mystery of efficiency.
meanings.sent4: The supervisor's guidance was a beacon in the sea of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor's role was crucial in keeping the operation on track.
